author: agowa338
body:
## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::PtrToStringUni([System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::SecureStringToGlobalAllocUnicode($(echo "aabbccdd" | ConvertTo-SecureString)))
# OR
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::PtrToStringBSTR([System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::SecureStringToBSTR($(echo "aabbccdd" | ConvertTo-SecureString)))
# OR
[Net.NetworkCredential]::new('', $(echo "aabbccdd" | ConvertTo-SecureString)).Password
# OR
echo "aabbccdd" | ConvertTo-SecureString | ConvertFrom-SecureString -AsPlainText
```

## Expected behavior

```none
"aabbccdd"
```

## Actual behavior

```none
뮪�
```
